alert.note: Alert for Isanti (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:11AM CDT until May 30 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR KANABEC...MILLE LACS...NORTHWESTERN ISANTI AND SOUTHEASTERN MORRISON COUNTIES... At 510 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lastrup to 6 miles south of Ogilvie, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Ogilvie, Mora, Grasston, Quamba, Vineland and Mille Lacs Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
